snippet: The last time the Chargers defense matched up against the Chiefs, it intercepted Matt Cassel three times, recovered three fumbles and scored one touchdown, which resulted in 20 fantasy points.
abstract: The last time the Chargers defense matched up against the Chiefs, it intercepted Matt Cassel three times, recovered three fumbles and scored one touchdown, which resulted in 20 fantasy points.

byline.original: By JASON SABLICH and JUSTIN SABLICH

headline.main: Week 9 in Fantasy Football: Thursday's Matchup
